pli-tv-bu-vb-sk64:1.1: Tena samayena buddho bhagavā sāvatthiyaṃ viharati jetavane anāthapiṇḍikassa ārāme.
pli-tv-bu-vb-sk64:1.2: Tena kho pana samayena chabbaggiyā bhikkhū sayanagatassa dhammaṃ desenti …
pli-tv-bu-vb-sk64:1.3: “Na sayanagatassa agilānassa dhammaṃ desessāmīti sikkhā karaṇīyā”ti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-sk64:1.5: Yo anādariyaṃ paṭicca antamaso chamāyampi nipannassa sayanagatassa agilānassa dhammaṃ deseti, āpatti dukkaṭassa.
